attributes.title: Configured my anatomy
attributes.review:
When I downloaded this app I started to projectile vomit everywhere. The bones in my arms started to disappear and I would get the flu every time. I also find it nasty that after downloading it Donald trump kept tagging me in his nudes on Twitter. Very inappropriate right? The worst part is that I don‚Äôt even own a Twitter. Which means the app downloaded and made an account or me without my consent. But now let‚Äôs get to the main reason of this. Configured my anatomy. I would randomly have outbursts where my anatomy would be configured with out my control. Sometime I would move with no control. But some of my scariest experience are listed below. 
1. My fingers got replaced with my toes
2. My feet got stuck in my mouth.
3. My eyes because tongues. 

That was only 3 out of my at least 500 experiences. I lost track. My life it absolutely ruined because of this app
